newsitem.title: USA: CBOT rice futures end firmer in thin volume.
newsitem.headline: CBOT rice futures end firmer in thin volume.

text.p: CBOT rice futures closed firmer in thin volume amid small lot short covering which boosted prices, traders said.
Traders said rice was oversold last week and continued to recover Tuesday.
Rice futures volume was estimated at 300 contracts, down from 387 Monday, according to the CBOT.
Rice futures closed one to four cents per cwt higher, with September up one at $10.14 per cwt. November was up four at $10.14.
